Vignjyaan doesn\'t save any of your datas other than the name, which you will enter here.
"To mould the youth as excellent engineers in Electronics and Communication for the betterment of the society"

This app is developed specially for ECE students of Government Engineering College Palakkad which helps students to access study materials, text books, previous year question papers, gate materials, etc.

- To impart theoretical foundations in Electronics And Communication engineering and instill practical expertise in the related domains and modern tool usage.\n- To inculcate professional and ethical responsibility for teamwork.\n- To enhance communication skills
